Package gov.nasa.pds.objectAccess

Class RawTableReader

java.lang.Object
gov.nasa.pds.objectAccess.TableReader
gov.nasa.pds.objectAccess.RawTableReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class RawTableReader extends TableReader
Table reader that provides the capability to read a table line by line rather than record by record, which is more strict as it relies on the label metadata.
Author:
mcayanan

      fileChannel - file channel stream used for ByteWideFileAccessor
